#include<iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>


using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
ll cal(ll n)
{
	
	ll val=1,co=1;
ll sum=0;
while(val<= n)
{
//cout<<"inside"<<endl;
	if(co%2==1)
{sum+=co;
//cout<<"co"<<co<<endl;
	}	
	
	co++;
	val=val+co;
	
	
}
	
	val=val-co;
	
		ll k=co-1,kk= n -val;

if(kk!=0)
	{
		if(kk%2==1)
		{
		sum=sum+co;	
			
		}
	
		
		
	}
	
	
	return sum;
}
int main()
{
	
	
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	
ll n,m;
cin>>n>>m;
n--;


	
	
ll sum1=cal(n);


ll  sum=cal(m);

ll ans=sum-sum1;


cout<<ans<<endl;


}
	return 0;
	
}
